Description: Imagine living where all the conveniences of shopping, dining and entertainment surround your every step. Woodlee Terrace offers quality living expressed by the unique design of our cozy efficiencies and our spacious one and two bedroom apartments in Woodbridge Virginia. In your free time, you'll enjoy our new, state of the art fitness center, business center, playground, and picnic areas with BBQ grills. Local Woodbridge Virginia attractions include historic Occoquan and Virginias largest single-floor mall, Potomac Mills. You'll feel right at home in Woodbridge Virginia once you walk through our doors, and we promise... you'll want to make our community your home!

Description: Welcome to Riverwoods located in Woodbridge, VA. We offer spacious 1, 2, and 3 bedroom apartments and townhomes for rent. Conveniently located close proximity to Potomac Mills Mall, Quantico Base, Fort Belvoir, and Route 1 and I-95 makes it easily accessible for residents. Our community is a beautiful designed townhome and garden apartment community that stands apart from the rest. You'll find the a variety of amenities and features you're looking for! Work out in the exercise room. Cool off in one of the swimming pools. Catch rays on the sun deck. Barbecue in one of the picnic areas. There's even a wading pool and a tot lot for the children. You'll enjoy life at River Woods. It's the best of all worlds!

Pet Policy: Dogs and Cats Allowed

Description: This condo is so unique and a must see! It's location gives it small town charm while being super close to the Big City. Newly renovated condo 2bdrm. 1.5bath located right on the water!!! Walking distance to the shops at Occoquan and a restaurant bar and grill that has weekly live music. The condo itself has hardwood floors throughout with a spacious galley style kitchen and a pantry. Washer and dryer in the unit. Has a patio and a storage unit. Comes with free parking spots and lots of available visitor parking for guests. Some utilities included. Condo community has tennis courts, a large pool and playground. Located right off of 95 and close to metro. Dogs/cats allowed with monthly pet fee.

Description: The Crossings at Summerland will immediately appeal to your sense of comfort and spacious living while at the same time, satisfying your needs for privacy and convenience. We’re pleasantly out of the way in the Woodbridge community, yet just a mile from I-95 and the bustling Potomac Mills Shopping Mall. The Crossings at Summerland is the result of our many years of experience in serving the needs of contented residents.

Description: STOP THE CAR! Stunning SFH w/ Water View of the Potomac River. 5BR 3.5BA home w/ 3 car garage that w/ over 4000 SqFt on 2 levels. 2 story Foyer and FR huge main level master w/ gas fireplace and luxury bath! Gourmet eat in kitchen. Newer paint&carpet throughout! Upper level bedroom has balcony & back deck has views of the river! Lots of windows & light! 1.5 miles to VRE! Home also for sale!

Close to Fort Belvoir Route 1 and 95 Exits. Sun filled Corner Unit with Open pastural views from all windows. Two master suites breakfast area den and Lots of closet space. 2093 SQFT Total . 2 Garage spaces & storage.

Description: This home features over 3800 finished sqft. Which includes 4 Bedrooms upstairs and laundry room: Oversized master suite with 2 closets. New Appliances Eat-in kitchen with extension to family room with fireplace. Formal living dining area and office. Finished Basement with storage area. Large deck and concrete patio below with fully fenced yard. 12 - 36 month lease. Must Have Good Credit.

Description: Carpet fridge and range to be replaced! Open floor plan! Spiral staircase leading to loft that is perfect for a den/home-office/guest area/hobby room/library. Built-in shelving in loft. Master Suite with full bath and walk-in closet! Wood-burning fireplace! Washer and dryer in unit! Large balcony with entrances from both bedrooms and the living room. Peaceful private view from balcony!

Description: Immaculate End TH in Commuter s Dream Belmont Bay ! Just a few blocks from the water sits this bright 3 level 3 BR End TH. Hardwoods on main level volume ceiling in LR gas fireplace in FR. Master Suite with upgraded Bath hardwoods & 2 closets. Unique location features available boat dockage VRE access & small town feel on the Occoquan River. Move in Ready waiting for the next owner.

Kitchen:
* Dishwasher
* Disposal
* Ice Maker
* Oven
* Range

Description: Humongous 4 level townhouse. Spacious living/dining areas with large eat in kitchen and slider to deck backing to woods. 3 large bedrooms each with their own bath. Double closets in each. Lower level has large rec rm w walkout a 4th full bath and both storage and utility rooms. Trash included in rent along with Lake Ridge amenities which includes 5 pools tennis tot lots and more.

Description: Spectacular sunny condo with wrap around deck overlooking the lake! Must see this 2BR 2BA unit with sun room gas FP neutral decor crown moulding washer & dryer. Fantastic location with lots of parking. Close to shopping and major commuting routes. Great amenities including pool tennis & basketball courts. PF 45 per adult plus 1 month rent w/application. Vacant to show anytime!

(571) 213-3284 - Spacious home on Catoctin Drive - Property Id: 38238
Bright, spacious family home on a cul de sac with a huge, fenced yard. Sep. Living Room and Dining Room with Hardwoods. Family Room with fireplace. Finished Basement. 4 Bedrooms. 3 are great sizes and smaller one is perfect for a nursery or office. Freshly painted, newer windows. CLEAN CLEAN and move in ready. Close to slug/commuter lot to all points north..Pentagon, Fort Belvoir, DC, Tysons. Close to schools.

Description:
(540) 628-2226 - STUNNING 5 BEDROOM HOME - IT'S SOMETHING SPECIAL - This home is impressive and you won't be disappointed. 5 bedroom, 3.5 bedroom home on half an acre in central area of Woodbridge. So much thought and care has gone into this home. Ornate entryway staircase, hardwood floors, granite and stainless steel in the kitchen. Huge master bedroom with soaking tub and separate shower. Large bedrooms upstairs with a loft and cozy reading space dormers. Family room with vaulted ceilings, brick gas fireplace. Huge rear deck opening onto the amazing fully fenced rear yard with shade tree's, patio with arbor and firepit. This home has a front office with built in bookcases. The basement has the 5th bedroom with its own bathroom (great in-law suite or nanny space). There is a also a recreation area in the basement also. You will fall in love with this home. Sorry no pets.
No Pets Allowed
(RLNE3592235) Pet policies - No Dogs Allowed, No Cats Allowed.

Description: Looking for an updated and well maintained rental? This beautiful two level front porch colonial home is conveniently located near schools shopping dining entertainment and recreational parks and services as well as major commuter routes. The home has been well cared for and includes many features you wont find in most rentals in this price range. Features include remodeled kitchen with movable island upgraded appliances recessed lighting sky lights large deck privacy fence new sliding glass door with blinds between the glass and level yard with shed and swing set. Available Oct 13th - pets allowed on case-by-case basis with deposit. Call Gary Garrison for information and to schedule a viewing - 703 772-9690.

Description: A well-maintained community offering the convenience of an easy commute seconds from I-95 and VRE. We offer use of copy/fax machines, swimming and wading pool, picnic area, ball court, and playground. We accept your packages, feed the cat and water your plants while you?re away. You will love our World Class Customer Service!

Description: Lake Ridge Fellowship House is a senior community located in Woodbridge, Virginia. The apartment homes have fully-equipped kitchens, some utilities included, and an emergency call system. The Lake Ridge Fellowship community has active social programs, on-site laundry facilities, reserved parking, and is handicap accessible. Lake Ridge Fellowship House is one of four communities that make up Fellowship Square.

Description: In the heart of Prince William County, Glen Ridge Commons puts you right in the middle of historic charm and modern convenience. Surrounded by cultural and entertainment options, Glen Ridge Commons offers you everything you want close to home. Hop on Prince William Parkway to get to I-95, VRE and Manassas. Glen Ridge Commons ideal location allows you to explore nearby Fountainhead, Chinn Regional Parks or visit Old Town Manassas for a relaxing change of pace.
